greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor(a(n-1)/2) if this is not among 0, a(1), ..., a(n-2); otherwise a(n) = 5*a(n-1).
link: Ivan Neretin, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: Rest@Nest[Append[#, If[FreeQ[#, r = Quotient[#[[-1]], 2]], r, 5 #[[-1]]]] &, {0, 1}, 55] (* _Ivan Neretin_, Jul 31 2016 *)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
